Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AILSEQUENCECB

The function AILSEQUENCECB specifies a user-defined XMIDI end of sequence callback.

void AILCALLBACK AILSEQUENCECB(
  HSEQUENCE sequence
);

In Parameters

sequence
indicates the sequence handle that generated the callback.

Discussion

This callback is made when a sequence has completed playback.


Group: XMIDI Services
Related Functions: AIL_register_sequence_callback
Related Basic Types: HSEQUENCE, void
